articles.title: Kyiv can win all of Ukraine back from Russia, Trump says - BBC
articles.description: The US president says Ukraine can win back land with support from Nato and Europe, marking a major shift in his position.
articles.content:
Anthony ZurcherNorth America correspondent
US President Donald Trump has said Kyiv can "win all of Ukraine back in its original form", marking a major shift in his position on the war with Russia.

articles.title: Trump criticizes European allies in U.N. speech: "Your countries are going to hell" - CBS News
articles.description: President Trump addressed the United Nations General Assembly on Tuesday, the 80th anniversary of the world body.
articles.content:
The senior Palestinian diplomat in the U.K., Ambassador Husam Zomlot, told CBS News on Tuesday that President Trump must live up to his vow to bring peace to the Middle East.
